articles.author: Daniel Ostanek
articles.title: Remco Evenepoel – 'This was the best way to honour Gino' - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Belgian pays tribute to Gino Mäder after taking solo victory on stage 7 of the Tour de Suisse
articles.content:
Remco Evenepoel paid tribute to Gino Mäder after soloing to the win on stage 7 of the Tour de Suisse, saying his attacking ride to close out a sombre stage was "the best way to honour Gino."
The wor… [+3660 chars]

articles.author: Lewis Duncan
articles.title: Why the Marquez/Zarco MotoGP spat shows Honda’s situation has become untenable - Motorsport.com
articles.description: OPINION: The collision between Marc Marquez and Johann Zarco in practice at the German Grand Prix ignited a war of words between the pair, and led to a social media frenzy. While Marquez’s behaviour was unbecoming, it highlights just how bad things are at Hon…
articles.content: Everyone has their breaking point. And everyone reacts in a different way when frustrations boil over, generally doing so in a way that is out of character. This is very much what we are seeing unfol… [+7593 chars]
